softReferral.liabilityReferral: This quote will be referred due to liability
softReferral.generalReferral: This quote will be referred due to duty disclosure

incompleteHeader.text: Answer a few simple questions to get an instant quote online.

premiumEstimateHeader.text: We have calculated an estimated premium based on the information provided so far.

premiumEstimateMessage.text: To calculate your final premium please complete the remaining questions.

premiumCompleteHeader.text: We have calculated a premium based on the information you have provided.

premiumCompleteMessage.text: To finalise your quote please complete the remaining questions and follow the prompts.

bindingQuoteHeader.text: We have finalised your quote using the information provided.

bindingQuoteMessage.text: To proceed with your quote please enter your payment details and follow the prompts.

paymentDetailsCompleteHeader.text: We have finalised your quote using the information provided.

paymentDetailsCompleteMessage.text: To complete your purchase please read and agree to our terms and conditions.

legalTermsAcceptedHeader.text: We have finalised your quote using the information provided.

legalTermsAcceptedMessage.text: To complete your purchase please follow the prompts.

softReferralHeader.text: We cannot complete your purchase online.

softReferralMessageDefault.text: Unfortunately we are unable to complete your purchase online based on your selections.

softReferralMessageAppendix.text: However, if you enter your contact details one of our qualified insurance experts will assist you in completing your purchase offline.

hardReferralHeader.text: We cannot generate your quote online.

hardReferralMessageDefault.text: Unfortunately our online channel cannot provide you with a quote based of your selections.

hardReferralMessageAppendix.text: However, if you enter your contact details one of our qualified insurance experts will assist you in completing your purchase offline.

declineMessageDefault.text: Unfortunately you are ineligible to purchase this insurance product based on your selections.

declineMessageAppendix.text: However, if you enter your contact details one of our qualified insurance experts will assist you in exploring alternative insurance products that may suit your situation.

errorHeader.text: We cannot generate your quote online.

errorMessageDefault.text: Unfortunately our online channel cannot provide you with a quote based of your selections.

errorMessageAppendix.text: However, if you enter your contact details one of our qualified insurance experts will assist you in completing your purchase offline.

helpMessageLabel.text: What doest this mean and why is it important?

enquiryText.text: Thank you for registering your interest. Your details have been passed on to one of our qualified insurance specialists, who will contact you shortly and assist you in obtaining the right cover.

referralText.text: However, your details have been passed on to one of our qualified insurance specialists, who will contact you shortly and assist you in obtaining the right cover.

declineText.text: However, one of our qualified insurance specialists may be able to recommend a different type of insurance product to provide the cover you need. If this would be of interest, please feel free to contact us today.

templateOptions.label: What level of public and product liability cover do you want?
How much would you like to insure your tools for?

validators.validation: Validators.compose([ValidationService.required('true', ''), ValidationService.customExpression('inTheNextDays(date(fieldValue), 30)', 'The start date must be in the next 30 days')])

Validators.compose([ValidationService.required('true', ''), ValidationService.isPostcode(), ValidationService.customExpression('postcodeInState(fieldValue, ratingState)', 'The postcode entered does not match the selected state')])

templateOptions.question: Please indicate any landlord, government statutory authority or government department require to be indemnified under your Public Liability Policy (Listed as Interested Party)?

content.customHTML:
• Lodge a claim for loss
  • Had any claims made against you
  • Lodge claims totalling more than $10,000?

templateOptions.label: Have you been charged or convicted of any criminal offences in the past 10 years?
Do you understand and accept your declaration?

content.paragraph: All answers and statements made by me/us in this application are true and accurate in every respect and no information has been withheld which is likely to affect the insurer’s decision about accepting this insurance.  I/we also acknowledge my insurance application may be declined and/or special conditions or increased premiums imposed.

templateOptions.label: How would you like to pay?

content.paragraph: You have the option to pay for your policy online today using credit card, or we can send you an invoice with other payment options (including cheque and EFT) that you can pay within 14 days.

content.customHTML:
Thank you for purchasing business insurance from ABC Insurance. Your invoice and policy documentation has been sent to your email address.

We've also sent you a link to log in to our portal so you can manage your policy, generate a certificate of currency, or lodge a claim.

Thanks for doing business with us, and if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to call us.
